queries.title: Search Queries
queries.description: One or more search queries to scrape. Add as many as you need.

provider.title: SERP Provider
provider.description: Select the SERP provider to use

providerKey.title: Provider API Key
providerKey.description: API key for the selected provider (can also be set via PROVIDER_KEY environment variable)

domain.title: Domain Filter
domain.description: Optional domain to filter and track. Accepted formats: lkyurology.com, www.lkyurology.com, or lkyurology. Do NOT include http://, https://, or paths. Pattern must match: ^(?:www\.)?[a-zA-Z0-9][-a-zA-Z0-9]*(?:\.[a-zA-Z0-9][-a-zA-Z0-9]*)*$

maxResults.title: Max Results
maxResults.description: Maximum number of results to retrieve before stopping (0 = unlimited)

noResultsRetries.title: No Results Retry Count
noResultsRetries.description: Number of times to retry when API returns no results (default: 2)

noResultsRetryDelay.title: No Results Retry Delay (ms)
noResultsRetryDelay.description: Delay in milliseconds between retries when no results (default: 2000)
